properties.entry: /** * Service method to load entity of type {0}. * Property {1} is being used as filter * * @param context DAO context * @param {2} THe value of property {1} to use as a filter * @return l' elenco dei risultati trovati * @throws AnprBasicException in caso di problemi durante il caricamento */
